PSSI: Alfin Lestaluhu Meninggal karena Encephalitis
01 Nov 2019, 06:10 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Alfin Lestaluhu menjadi salah satu andalan Timnas Indonesia U-16. (CNN Indonesia/Bisma Septalisma)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Bek Timnas Indonesia U-16 Alfin Lestaluhu meninggal dunia dikabarkan karena penyakit encephalitis (infeksi otak) dengan hypoalbuminemia.Kabar tersebut diungkap PSSI melalui situs resmi federasi. PSSI mengabarkan Alfin meninggal dunia di Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita, Jakarta, pukul 22.11 WIB pada Kamis (31/10)."Keluarga besar PSSI mendoakan yang terbaik untuk Alfin dan keluarga. Kami sangat kehilangan. Terima kasih atas sumbangsih Alfin untuk tim nasional Indonesia," kata Sekjen PSSI Ratu Tisha Destira.PSSI mengabarkan berdasarkan diagnosa dokter, Alfin meninggal karena penyakit encephalitis (infeksi otak) dengan hypoalbuminemia. Jenazah Alfin rencananya akan dimakamkan di kampung halamannya di Ternate, Ambon.



Dikutip dari Antara, penyakit encephalitis berdasarkan Perpustakaan Kedokteran Amerika Serikat adalah infeksi virus atau bakteri. Di tingkat yang parah radang otak tersebut menimbulkan gejala seperti sakit kepala berat, demam mendadak, muntah, mengantuk, kebingungan, dan kejang.Alfin sebelumnya merupakan salah satu korban gempa yang mengguncang Ambon pada 26 September lalu. Pemain yang berposisi sebagai bek kanan itu sempat dirawat di Rumah Sakit Tentara, Ambon, sebelum mendapat perawatan lebih lanjut di Jakarta.Alfin adalah andalan Timnas Indonesia U-16 di bawah asuhan pelatih Bima Sakti. Alfin sukses membawa Timnas Indonesia U-16 ke putaran final Piala Asia 2020 yang akan digelar di Bahrain. (har)

PSSI: Alfin Lestaluhu died of encephalitis
01 Nov 2019, 06:10 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Alfin Lestaluhu became one of the mainstays of the Indonesian National Team U-16. (CNN Indonesia / Bisma Septalisma)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Indonesian U-16 national team defender Alfin Lestaluhu died reportedly due to encephalitis (a brain infection) with hypoalbuminemia. The news was revealed by PSSI through the official website of the federation. PSSI reported Alfin died at Harapan Kita Hospital, Jakarta, at 22.11 WIB on Thursday (10/31). "The PSSI family wishes the best for Alfin and his family. We are very lost. Thank you for Alfin's contribution to the Indonesian national team, "PSSI Secretary General Ratu Tisha Destira said. PSSI reported that based on doctor's diagnosis, Alfin died of encephalitis (a brain infection) with hypoalbuminemia. Alfin's body is planned to be buried in his hometown in Ternate, Ambon.



Quoted from Antara, encephalitis based on the United States Medical Library is a viral or bacterial infection. At a severe level, the inflammation of the brain caused symptoms such as severe headaches, sudden fever, vomiting, drowsiness, confusion, and seizures. Alfin was previously one of the victims of the earthquake that shook Ambon on 26 September. The player who plays as a right-back was briefly treated at the Army Hospital, Ambon, before receiving further treatment in Jakarta. Alffin is a mainstay of the Indonesian National Team U-16 under the tutelage of the Milky Way coach. Alfin successfully brought the Indonesian U-16 national team to the 2020 Asian Cup finals which will be held in Bahrain. (har)
